name: reinforce_tactics
title: Reinforce Tactics
description: A turn-based tactical strategy game where two players command armies of diverse unit types to capture the enemy headquarters or eliminate all enemy units.

episodeSteps.description: Maximum number of turns before the game ends in a draw.

mapSeed.description: Random seed for map generation. -1 for random. Only used when mapName is empty.

mapName.description: Name of a built-in map to use (e.g. 'beginner', 'crossroads', 'tower_rush'). Leave empty for random generation.

enabledUnits.description: Comma-separated list of enabled unit types (W=Warrior, M=Mage, C=Cleric, A=Archer, K=Knight, R=Rogue, S=Sorcerer, B=Barbarian).

fogOfWar.description: Enable fog of war for partial observability.

board.description: 2D array of terrain type codes. Each cell is a single character: p=grass, w=water, m=mountain, f=forest, r=road, b=building, h=headquarters, t=tower, o=ocean.

structures.description: Array of structure dicts with keys: x, y, type, owner, hp, maxHp. Only includes capturable tiles (buildings, towers, HQ).

units.description: Array of unit dicts with keys: type, owner, x, y, hp, maxHp, canMove, canAttack, paralyzedTurns, isHasted, distanceMoved, defenceBuffTurns, attackBuffTurns.

gold.description: Array of gold amounts for each player: [player1_gold, player2_gold].

player.description: The player index for this agent (0 or 1).

turnNumber.description: The current turn number (increments after both players have acted).

action.description: A list of action command dicts for this turn. Each dict has a 'type' key plus action-specific fields. Valid types: create_unit, move, attack, seize, heal, cure, paralyze, haste, defence_buff, attack_buff, end_turn.

reward.description: Final reward: 1=Won, 0=Draw, -1=Lost. During the game reward is 0.
